article_title: You Probably Aren't Going to Get COVID-19 From a Package
article_description: Social distancing means a lot of people are avoiding stores  Depending on where you live  those stores might even be closed for the time being  All that means that we re all making a few more purchases online than we might ordinarily  Those delivered packages
